info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 6 at 5:41PM EDT until June 6 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Albany NY
info.description:
At 541 PM EDT, local law enforcement reported thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Local police reported significant flooding in the city of Poughkeepsie with cars getting stuck in flood waters. One location provided was Kingston Avenue and Arnold Boulevard. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Law enforcement reported.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Poughkeepsie, Pleasant Valley, Highland, Red Oaks Mill, Fairview, Arlington, Manchester Bridge, Macdonnell Heights, Colonial Heights, Titusville, Rochdale, Rombout Ridge, Clark Heights, Spackenkill, Timothy Heights, Dongan Place, Haviland, Rudco, Van Keurens and Crown Heights.
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR WEST CENTRAL DUTCHESS COUNTY
NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 7:15 PM EDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 7:15 PM EDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR WEST CENTRAL DUTCHESS COUNTY
SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 7:15 PM EDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 7:15 PM EDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
